content:
Welcome to #Profiling Academy.

Description: Discussion of the Profiling Academy: Sharing of knowledge, questions, ideas/suggestions for improvement, discussions of best-practices and so on.

Hello,

Iâ€™m one of the authors of the Profiling Academy: http://simplifier.net/guide/ProfilingAcademy

The Profiling Academy is an online school for those who want to learn more about profiling. The Profiling Academy is laid out into modules containing instructions, real-life examples and exercises. It has a lot to offer for both beginners and experts!

Please feel free to start a discussion in this stream. Knowledge you want to share, questions you have when working through the modules, ideas or suggestions for improvement or anything else you come up with!

Happy profiling!

Lilian
